sentences.sContent: Detectives are still trying to unravel the mystery surrounding his death.
sentences.sCn: 侦探们仍在试图解开他的死亡之谜。

remMethod.val: un(不)+ravel(纠缠) → 拆开， 拆散； 解开

trans.tranCn: 拆开， 拆散； 解开
trans.tranOther: if you unravel threads, string etc, or if they unravel, they stop being twisted together
